thread.title: Thailand’s Media Crackdown

author: wsjcom
title: Thailand’s Media Crackdown
text:
Thai authorities have indicted a Canadian photojournalist for carrying a flak jacket and helmet while covering the aftermath of Bangkok’s deadly shrine explosion in August. Authorities say such protective gear is a weapon under Thailand’s arms law. This dubious charge amounts to another restriction of press freedom in an increasingly restive country.
Anthony Kwan, a dual Canadian-Hong Kong citizen and former Minnesota resident, was detained in August at a Bangkok airport. Mr. Kwan works for a Hong Kong-based media group... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
